sentences.english: Based on the scheduling principle of Dahuofang reservoir, we set up an integrated flood regulation system in Hun basin.
sentences.chinese: 建立了以大夥房水庫爲中心的渾河流域防洪調度系統。

sentences.english: The "three-nitrogen" pollution is mainly centralized in the Hunhe river valley.
sentences.chinese: “三氮”污染主要集中在渾河流域。
